item.title: Broken utility hole cover, 26th June
item.description:
A large section of the concrete cover is missing, leaving a deep, open hole with exposed cables inside. It presents a serious trip hazard to pedestrians and could cause injury, especially to children or anyone not noticing it in time. Iâ€™d be grateful if this could be inspected and made safe as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lullingstone Crescent, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive littering, 26th June
item.description:
There is excessive litter always outside my flat window, with me having the window open now in summer I can see the litter being thrown down by the neighbours in the flats above. The litter pickers come every week and do a good job but there is constant rubbish being thrown down by the people in the flats above above

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tiverton Street, Elephant and Castle, London
